# äºˆç´„ç®¡ç†ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã®ä½œæˆ

äºˆç´„ç®¡ç†ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«ã€æ–°ã—ã„ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€æ§‹é€ ã¨ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚ã“ã®ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã§ã¯1æ—¥ã®äºˆç´„ã‚’ç®¡ç†ã§ãã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

## 1. äºˆç´„ç®¡ç†ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã®ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸

```typescript:src/app/reservation/page.tsx
"use client";
import { useState, useEffect } from "react";
import { format, parse, addMinutes } from "date-fns";
import { ja } from "date-fns/locale";

// äºˆç´„ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã®å‹å®šç¾©
interface Reservation {
  id: string;
  name: string;
  email: string;
  phone: string;
  date: string;
  startTime: string;
  endTime: string;
  notes: string;
}

// æ™‚é–“æ ã®å‹å®šç¾©
interface TimeSlot {
  startTime: string;
  endTime: string;
  isAvailable: boolean;
  reservation?: Reservation;
}

const ReservationApp = () => {
  // çŠ¶æ…‹ç®¡ç†
  const [selectedDate, setSelectedDate] = useState<string>(
    format(new Date(), "yyyy-MM-dd")
  );
  const [timeSlots, setTimeSlots] = useState<TimeSlot[]>([]);
  const [reservations, setReservations] = useState<Reservation[]>([]);
  const [showForm, setShowForm] = useState<boolean>(false);
  const [selectedTimeSlot, setSelectedTimeSlot] = useState<TimeSlot | null>(null);
  const [formData, setFormData] = useState<Omit<Reservation, "id">>({
    name: "",
    email: "",
    phone: "",
    date: selectedDate,
    startTime: "",
    endTime: "",
    notes: "",
  });
  const [darkMode, setDarkMode] = useState<boolean>(false);

  // å–¶æ¥­æ™‚é–“ã®è¨­å®š
  const businessHours = {
    start: "09:00",
    end: "18:00",
    slotDuration: 30, // åˆ†å˜ä½
  };

  // æ™‚é–“æ ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã™ã‚‹é–¢æ•°
  const generateTimeSlots = (date: string) => {
    const slots: TimeSlot[] = [];
    const startTime = parse(businessHours.start, "HH:mm", new Date());
    const endTime = parse(businessHours.end, "HH:mm", new Date());
    
    let currentTime = startTime;
    
    while (currentTime < endTime) {
      const start = format(currentTime, "HH:mm");
      const end = format(addMinutes(currentTime, businessHours.slotDuration), "HH:mm");
      
      // ã“ã®æ™‚é–“æ ã«äºˆç´„ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã‹ç¢ºèª
      const existingReservation = reservations.find(
        (r) => r.date === date && r.startTime === start
      );
      
      slots.push({
        startTime: start,
        endTime: end,
        isAvailable: !existingReservation,
        reservation: existingReservation,
      });
      
      currentTime = addMinutes(currentTime, businessHours.slotDuration);
    }
    
    return slots;
  };

  // æ—¥ä»˜å¤‰æ›´æ™‚ã«æ™‚é–“æ ã‚’æ›´æ–°
  useEffect(() => {
    setTimeSlots(generateTimeSlots(selectedDate));
  }, [selectedDate, reservations]);

  // ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‹ã‚‰äºˆç´„ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’èª­ã¿è¾¼ã‚€
  useEffect(() => {
    const savedReservations = localStorage.getItem("reservations");
    if (savedReservations) {
      setReservations(JSON.parse(savedReservations));
    }
  }, []);

  // äºˆç´„ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒå¤‰æ›´ã•ã‚ŒãŸã‚‰ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«ä¿å­˜
  useEffect(() => {
    if (reservations.length > 0) {
      localStorage.setItem("reservations", JSON.stringify(reservations));
    }
  }, [reservations]);

  // æ™‚é–“æ ã‚’ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã—ãŸã¨ãã®å‡¦ç†
  const handleTimeSlotClick = (timeSlot: TimeSlot) => {
    if (timeSlot.isAvailable) {
      setSelectedTimeSlot(timeSlot);
      setFormData({
        ...formData,
        date: selectedDate,
        startTime: timeSlot.startTime,
        endTime: timeSlot.endTime,
      });
      setShowForm(true);
    } else {
      // äºˆç´„è©³ç´°ã‚’è¡¨ç¤º
      alert(`
        äºˆç´„æƒ…å ±:
        åå‰: ${timeSlot.reservation?.name}
        ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«: ${timeSlot.reservation?.email}
        é›»è©±: ${timeSlot.reservation?.phone}
        ãƒ¡ãƒ¢: ${timeSlot.reservation?.notes || "ãªã—"}
      `);
    }
  };

  // ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ é€ä¿¡æ™‚ã®å‡¦ç†
  const handleSubmit = (e: React.FormEvent) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    
    // æ–°ã—ã„äºˆç´„ã‚’ä½œæˆ
    const newReservation: Reservation = {
      id: Date.now().toString(),
      ...formData,
    };
    
    // äºˆç´„ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã«è¿½åŠ 
    setReservations([...reservations, newReservation]);
    
    // ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚’ãƒªã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆ
    setFormData({
      name: "",
      email: "",
      phone: "",
      date: selectedDate,
      startTime: "",
      endTime: "",
      notes: "",
    });
    
    setShowForm(false);
    setSelectedTimeSlot(null);
  };

  // äºˆç´„ã‚’ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³ã‚»ãƒ«ã™ã‚‹å‡¦ç†
  const handleCancelReservation = (id: string) => {
    if (window.confirm("ã“ã®äºˆç´„ã‚’ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³ã‚»ãƒ«ã—ã¾ã™ã‹ï¼Ÿ")) {
      const updatedReservations = reservations.filter((r) => r.id !== id);
      setReservations(updatedReservations);
      
      // ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚‚æ›´æ–°
      if (updatedReservations.length > 0) {
        localStorage.setItem("reservations", JSON.stringify(updatedReservations));
      } else {
        localStorage.removeItem("reservations");
      }
    }
  };

  // ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã®å…¥åŠ›å¤‰æ›´ã‚’å‡¦ç†
  const handleInputChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement | HTMLTextAreaElement>) => {
    const { name, value } = e.target;
    setFormData({
      ...formData,
      [name]: value,
    });
  };

  // ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ‰åˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆ
  const toggleDarkMode = () => {
    setDarkMode(!darkMode);
  };

  // æ—¥ä»˜ã‚’ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒƒãƒˆã™ã‚‹é–¢æ•°
  const formatDate = (dateString: string) => {
    const date = parse(dateString, "yyyy-MM-dd", new Date());
    return format(date, "yyyyå¹´MMæœˆddæ—¥ (eee)", { locale: ja });
  };

  return (
    <div className={`min-h-screen ${darkMode ? "dark bg-gray-900 text-white" : "bg-gray-50 text-gray-900"}`}>
      <div className="container mx-auto p-4 max-w-4xl">
        {/* ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ */}
        <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-6">
          <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold text-blue-600 dark:text-blue-400">
            äºˆç´„ç®¡ç†ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ 
          </h1>
          <button
            onClick={toggleDarkMode}
            className="p-2 rounded-full bg-gray-200 dark:bg-gray-700"
          >
            {darkMode ? "ğŸŒ" : "ğŸŒ™"}
          </button>
        </div>

        {/* æ—¥ä»˜é¸æŠ */}
        <div className="mb-6 bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-lg shadow-md p-4">
          <h2 className="text-lg font-medium mb-2 text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300">
            æ—¥ä»˜ã‚’é¸æŠ:
          </h2>
          <div className="flex items-center">
            <input
              type="date"
              value={selectedDate}
              onChange={(e) => setSelectedDate(e.target.value)}
              className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 rounded-md p-2 bg-white dark:bg-gray-700 text-gray-800 dark:text-gray-200"
            />
            <span className="ml-4 text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400">
              {formatDate(selectedDate)}
            </span>
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* æ™‚é–“æ ä¸€è¦§ */}
        <div className="mb-6 bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-lg shadow-md p-4">
          <h2 className="text-lg font-medium mb-4 text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300">
            äºˆç´„çŠ¶æ³:
          </h2>
          <div className="grid grid-cols-2 sm:grid-cols-3 md:grid-cols-4 gap-2">
            {timeSlots.map((slot, index) => (
              <div
                key={index}
                onClick={() => handleTimeSlotClick(slot)}
                className={`p-3 rounded-md text-center cursor-pointer transition-colors ${
                  slot.isAvailable
                    ? "bg-green-100 hover:bg-green-200 text-green-800 dark:bg-green-900 dark:hover:bg-green-800 dark:text-green-200"
                    : "bg-red-100 hover:bg-red-200 text-red-800 dark:bg-red-900 dark:hover:bg-red-800 dark:text-red-200"
                }`}
              >
                <div className="font-medium">{slot.startTime} - {slot.endTime}</div>
                <div className="text-xs mt-1">
                  {slot.isAvailable ? "äºˆç´„å¯èƒ½" : slot.reservation?.name}
                </div>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* äºˆç´„ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ  */}
        {showForm && (
          <div className="mb-6 bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-lg shadow-md p-4">
            <h2 className="text-lg font-medium mb-4 text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300">
              æ–°è¦äºˆç´„: {selectedTimeSlot?.startTime} - {selectedTimeSlot?.endTime}
            </h2>
            <form onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
              <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4 mb-4">
                <div>
                  <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300 mb-1">
                    ãŠåå‰ *
                  </label>
                  <input
                    type="text"
                    name="name"
                    value={formData.name}
                    onChange={handleInputChange}
                    required
                    className="w-full p-2 border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 rounded-md bg-white dark:bg-gray-700 text-gray-800 dark:text-gray-200"
                  />
                </div>
                <div>
                  <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300 mb-1">
                    ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ *
                  </label>
                  <input
                    type="email"
                    name="email"
                    value={formData.email}
                    onChange={handleInputChange}
                    required
                    className="w-full p-2 border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 rounded-md bg-white dark:bg-gray-700 text-gray-800 dark:text-gray-200"
                  />
                </div>
                <div>
                  <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300 mb-1">
                    é›»è©±ç•ªå· *
                  </label>
                  <input
                    type="tel"
                    name="phone"
                    value={formData.phone}
                    onChange={handleInputChange}
                    required
                    className="w-full p-2 border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 rounded-md bg-white dark:bg-gray-700 text-gray-800 dark:text-gray-200"
                  />
                </div>
                <div className="md:col-span-2">
                  <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300 mb-1">
                    å‚™è€ƒ
                  </label>
                  <textarea
                    name="notes"
                    value={formData.notes}
                    onChange={handleInputChange}
                    className="w-full p-2 border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 rounded-md bg-white dark:bg-gray-700 text-gray-800 dark:text-gray-200 h-24"
                  ></textarea>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div className="flex justify-end space-x-2">
                <button
                  type="button"
                  onClick={() => {
                    setShowForm(false);
                    setSelectedTimeSlot(null);
                  }}
                  className="px-4 py-2 bg-gray-200 text-gray-700 rounded-md hover:bg-gray-300 dark:bg-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300 dark:hover:bg-gray-600"
                >
                  ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³ã‚»ãƒ«
                </button>
                <button
                  type="submit"
                  className="px-4 py-2 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-md hover:bg-blue-700"
                >
                  äºˆç´„ã™ã‚‹
                </button>
              </div>
            </form>
          </div>
        )}

        {/* æœ¬æ—¥ã®äºˆç´„ä¸€è¦§ */}
        <div className="bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-lg shadow-md p-4">
          <h2 className="text-lg font-medium mb-4 text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300">
            {formatDate(selectedDate)}ã®äºˆç´„ä¸€è¦§:
          </h2>
          {reservations.filter((r) => r.date === selectedDate).length > 0 ? (
            <div className="overflow-x-auto">
              <table className="min-w-full divide-y divide-gray-200 dark:divide-gray-700">
                <thead className="bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-900">
                  <tr>
                    <th className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400 uppercase tracking-wider">
                      æ™‚é–“
                    </th>
                    <th className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400 uppercase tracking-wider">
                      åå‰
                    </th>
                    <th className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400 uppercase tracking-wider">
                      é€£çµ¡å…ˆ
                    </th>
                    <th className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400 uppercase tracking-wider">
                      æ“ä½œ
                    </th>
                  </tr>
                </thead>
                <tbody className="bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 divide-y divide-gray-200 dark:divide-gray-700">
                  {reservations
                    .filter((r) => r.date === selectedDate)
                    .sort((a, b) => a.startTime.localeCompare(b.startTime))
                    .map((reservation) => (
                      <tr key={reservation.id}>
                        <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300">
                          {reservation.startTime} - {reservation.endTime}
                        </td>
                        <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300">
                          {reservation.name}
                        </td>
                        <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300">
                          <div>{reservation.email}</div>
                          <div>{reservation.phone}</div>
                        </td>
                        <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm">
                          <button
                            onClick={() => handleCancelReservation(reservation.id)}
                            className="text-red-600 hover:text-red-800 dark:text-red-400 dark:hover:text-red-300"
                          >
                            ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³ã‚»ãƒ«
                          </button>
                        </td>
                      </tr>
                    ))}
                </tbody>
              </table>
            </div>
          ) : (
            <p className="text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400">äºˆç´„ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“</p>
          )}
        </div>

        {/* ãƒ•ãƒƒã‚¿ãƒ¼ */}
        <div className="mt-12 text-center text-sm text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400">
          <p>Â© 2025 äºˆç´„ç®¡ç†ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ  - ç°¡å˜ã«äºˆç´„ã‚’ç®¡ç†</p>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

export default ReservationApp;
```

## 2. ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«

```typescript:src/app/reservation/layout.tsx
import type { Metadata } from "next";
import { Inter } from "next/font/google";
import "../globals.css";

const inter = Inter({ subsets: ["latin"] });

export const metadata: Metadata = {
  title: "äºˆç´„ç®¡ç†ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ ",
  description: "1æ—¥ã®äºˆç´„ã‚’ç°¡å˜ã«ç®¡ç†ã§ãã‚‹ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³",
};

export default function ReservationLayout({
  children,
}: Readonly<{
  children: React.ReactNode;
}>) {
  return (
    <html lang="ja">
      <body className={inter.className}>{children}</body>
    </html>
  );
}
```

## æ©Ÿèƒ½ã®èª¬æ˜

ã“ã®äºˆç´„ç®¡ç†ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã«ã¯ä»¥ä¸‹ã®æ©Ÿèƒ½ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ï¼š

1. **æ—¥ä»˜é¸æŠ**: ã‚«ãƒ¬ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‹ã‚‰æ—¥ä»˜ã‚’é¸æŠã—ã¦ã€ãã®æ—¥ã®äºˆç´„çŠ¶æ³ã‚’ç¢ºèªã§ãã¾ã™
2. **æ™‚é–“æ è¡¨ç¤º**: é¸æŠã—ãŸæ—¥ã®äºˆç´„å¯èƒ½ãªæ™‚é–“æ ã‚’ä¸€è¦§è¡¨ç¤ºã—ã¾ã™
3. **äºˆç´„ä½œæˆ**: ç©ºã„ã¦ã„ã‚‹æ™‚é–“æ ã‚’ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã—ã¦äºˆç´„ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã—ã€äºˆç´„ã‚’ä½œæˆã§ãã¾ã™
4. **äºˆç´„ç¢ºèª**: äºˆç´„æ¸ˆã¿ã®æ™‚é–“æ ã‚’ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã™ã‚‹ã¨ã€äºˆç´„è©³ç´°ã‚’ç¢ºèªã§ãã¾ã™
5. **äºˆç´„ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³ã‚»ãƒ«**: äºˆç´„ä¸€è¦§ã‹ã‚‰äºˆç´„ã‚’ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³ã‚»ãƒ«ã§ãã¾ã™
6. **ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ‰**: æ˜æš—ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒã‚’åˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆã‚‰ã‚Œã¾ã™
7. **ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚¸**: äºˆç´„ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã¯ãƒ–ãƒ©ã‚¦ã‚¶ã®ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«ä¿å­˜ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™

ã“ã®ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã¯ã€ç¾å®¹é™¢ã€ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ‹ãƒƒã‚¯ã€ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ã‚»ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°ãªã©ã€1æ—¥å˜ä½ã§æ™‚é–“æ äºˆç´„ã‚’ç®¡ç†ã™ã‚‹æ¥­ç¨®ã«é©ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

å¿…è¦ã«å¿œã˜ã¦ã€ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªæ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚‚å¯èƒ½ã§ã™ï¼š
